name: Assimpkit
tagline: A cross platform library (OS X, iOS) that coverts the files supported by Assimp to Scene Kit (.scn) format.
body:
### AssimpKit
A library that uses Assimp to import 3D model files and convert them into SceneKit scenes. 

### Supported features
* Geometry
* Materials (colors and textures)
* Lights
* Cameras
* Skeletal Animations 
 
### Gallery

![AssimpKit iOS](http://imgur.com/2wcj8XU)
![AssimpKit OSX](http://imgur.com/DgDMEpR)

### Authors
@dmsurti

### License

AssimpKit's license is based on the modified, 3-clause BSD-License.

An informal summary is: do whatever you want, but include Assimp Kit's license text with your product - and don't sue me if the code doesn't work. For the legal details, see the LICENSE file.
